metadata.name: Aya
metadata.description:
This fairy's name is Aya (OC) and she acts as the beloved protector of the frozen forest. 
She uses her mysterious powers to sustain the forest's lifeforce. 
Although she's quick to get embarrassed, she still loves to give visitors ice flowers as presents. 
Would you accept her gift? 
I would like to continue drawing Aya so please support us. 
Thank you.

2950 * 4100 pixel 300dpi
created by PORA
